Address: 62 Belmont Road West CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
DOUBLE DELIGHT!
On the high side of a no-through road, this north-facing allotment of 926m approx. has an existing, renovated 3 bedroom house, plus plans and permit for a rear 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home.
The single-storey house has undergone a top-quality renovation and is presented like a brand new home. Polished hardwood floors grace the entry, hall and kitchen zone, accompanied by new carpets in the sunken living room and 3 bedrooms (2 with BIRs). The fully-renovated bathroom is crisp and stylish, featuring a semi-frameless shower and separate bath. The kitchen features gloss and soft-close cabinetry, stone benchtops and stainless steel De Longhi appliances (900mm cooker and dishwasher), adjoining a dining area with deck access. Inclusions: Rinnai (electric) heaters, air-conditioner and ceiling fans.
Demolish the backyard garage to build the proposed 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom townhouse with a double garage, featuring downstairs living, dining and kitchen, plus the ground floor master suite with an ensuite and walk-in wardrobe. Upstairs, 2 robed bedrooms share a family bathroom and rumpus room.
Shop and dine at nearby Eastfield Mall, Merrindale SC and Croydon Central, close to buses, Eastfield, Belmont and Cheong Parks.
HIGHLIGHTS
Fully renovated 3 bedroom house plus planning approval
Stone and s/steel kitchen
New carpets
Build a new unit at rear
Near bus, shops, cafes and parks

Description:
Discover an Uplifting One Owner Home
You'll see the pride of ownership as soon as you arrive at this immaculate, one owner 3 bedroom 2 bathroom family home. Set on 858 m2 (approx.), in a premier address, it's opposite parkland; a few short steps to Tinternvale Primary School, transport and Eastfield Mall. Exquisite landscaped gardens introduce a light-filled interior that uplifts you with two living areas, tasteful decor and garden views. Three double bedrooms (ceiling fans, BIRs) and 2 bathrooms are privately zoned; including the master with huge WIR and ensuite. Formal lounge (wood fire heater) and formal dining areas invite relaxation. You can watch the kids and the soothing water feature from the well-appointed kitchen featuring walk-in pantry and dishwasher. The family/meals room opens to the undercover alfresco and splendid landscaped garden highlighted by colourful exotics, pond and lawn. An x-large remote double garage with workshop, tradie's office and high ceilings has space for caravan, trailer or work. Plus: ducted heating, split system, off street parking, water storage and shed. Close to Ringwood East station, Tintern Grammar, Eastland and EastLink.
Travis Milton : 0414 404 942

Description:
Under Offer/ Under Contract
Under Offer/ Under Contract. This is a fabulous opportunity to secure a modern home to call your own, in a wonderful Croydon locale. With unbeatable convenience to shops, cafes, transport, parklands, and easy access to the city, you'll be comfortably nestled in a quiet yet convenient area of Croydon. Set to the back of the block for supreme peace and privacy, the inviting residence comprises a spacious lounge/dining room with plush carpet and courtyard view, adjoining kitchen with quality Blanco 900mm cooker, Bosch dishwasher, and great bench/storage space, 3 robed bedrooms (master with walk-in robe and ensuite), modern family bathroom, and bright functional laundry. Outside, a low maintenance courtyard is just the place for alfresco entertaining, while additional features include ducted heating/refrigerative cooling, 2.7m ceiling, modern décor, good proportions, integrated double garage, and no body corporate. An easy stroll to the Dorset Public Golf Course or Recreational Reserve, what are you waiting for?

Description:
Brilliant Indoor/Outdoor Family Appeal
You'll discover 3 living zones and fabulous outdoor entertaining in this appealing 4 bedroom 2 bathroom family retreat. Set in the Gateway Estate close to transport, Merrindale shops, parks, Dorset Primary and Tintern Grammar, it's ready to enjoy and makes a wonderful first impression with colonial-style windows, a double carport (with roller door storage) and a pretty landscaped garden. Walk through the entry hallway with storage into the light-filled interior where high ceilings, garden views and modern decor create feel-good living. The private master boasts WIR, bay window, split system and ensuite. Two rear bedrooms (BIRs) share a family bathroom, and there's also a study or 4th bedroom option. The gourmet kitchen is a cook's delight showcasing s/s appliances (900mm oven). Parents will enjoy quiet time in the stylish lounge/dining room, while the home theatre room and bright family room open to the covered deck and 8-seater spa; for memorable entertaining. Children will love the idyllic garden featuring cubby, play equipment, fish pond, palms, and citrus trees. Plus: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2 split systems, solar panels and 2 garden sheds. Don't miss it!
Lee Fenech : 0410 426 400

Address: 1/26 Belmont Road West CROYDON SOUTH VIC 3136
Description:
A Fantastically Positioned & Charismatic Clinker!
Sale by Negotiation
Situated in the leafy and much admired Belmont Road, and placed to the fore of just one other modern home, this charming clinker brick abode provides a most desirable and enviably well serviced lifestyle set close to an array of amenities - certain to be appreciated by downsizers, professionals, first homebuyers and investors alike.
Exhibiting a picturesque facade, the homes cosy interiors are beautifully presented and flaunt a fresh, neutral decor throughout accentuated further by impressively high ceilings. Featuring a sizeable formal lounge boasting classic picture railing, a vogue light fitting, plush carpet and large windows facing north to delightfully illuminate - all combining to create a serene space inspiring relaxation.
In addition, the central kitchen affords plentiful solid timber surfaces and chic 'country style' soft-closing cabinetry plus a gas freestanding cooker; overlooking a sizeable second living space or study enjoying access to the minimal maintenance, exposed aggregate courtyard ideal for alfresco dining, with a grassed area for kids and pets.
There are also two generously sized bedrooms amply serviced by the spotless bathroom with modern vanity, shower and bathtub, plus separate toilet.
Further benefits also include gas heating, separate laundry, near new carpet, modern light fittings, garden shed, retractable washing line, external awnings, carport and off-street parking for a second vehicle.
Located a short walk from The Mall local shopping precinct, Tinternvale Primary and Tintern Grammar, parklands and walking trails, and close to Merrindale Shopping Centre, both Croydon and Ringwood with cafes, eateries, shops and rail transport, and just minutes to Eastland Shopping Centre (currently undergoing a multi-million dollar redevelopment) and EastLink, this charismatic home should be at the top of your must see list!
Proudly marketed by Barry Plant Real Estate Croydon
For further information contact Ash Thompson 0401 205 320 or athompson@barryplant.com.au
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320

Description:
Quality Four Bedroom Townhouse Designed with Distinction
This beautiful 4 bedroom weatherboard home currently under construction by the prestigious Croydon Home Builders showcases the best of contemporary comfort, coupled with an array of premium appointments and innovative design to create the ultimate family home. This stunning home will boast its own stylish persona through the open plan lounge and dining area, opening to a private merbau deck to relax and entertain on, supported by the designer kitchen, resplendent with Caesar stone bench tops and a quality 900mm upright stove/oven with matching canopy range hood and dishwasher. The ground level also boasts a fantastic master bedroom with ensuite, powder room and laundry. The upstairs master bedroom with BIR and full ensuite and the other 2 robed bedrooms with central bathroom and second living area and retreat are ideally positioned on the second level away from the downstairs living areas. Other features include polished floors, quality carpets and tiles, evaporative cooling, 6 star energy ratings, quality and innovative bathroom fittings, remote double lock up garage, LED downlights throughout and fully landscaped gardens. Certainly the location is stunning, handy to Croydon and Croydon South shops, Swinburne TAFE, transport including bus and rail, parklands and sporting facilities. take advantage of the stamp duty reductions and be ready to move in by late 2015.
*Please note photos shown are of a previous development.

Description:
Brand New Luxury on Pandora
Unit 3: Offers Over $490,000
Nothing feels as amazing as brand new luxury. This new single-level unit offer you a spacious, light-filled design, with a focus on energy efficiency and functionality. Privately hidden at the rear of only 3, you'll enjoy high quality finishes and modern comfort, from the porcelain tiles, CaesarStone benchtops, quality carpets and high ceilings, to the large awning windows, fitted robes, internal access remote garage, ducted heating and split system. Imagine a Chef's CaesarStone kitchen boasting s/s 900mm Domain appliances, glass splashbacks, water filter, island bar and ample storage. A big family/meals room opens to the large deck and landscaped garden for easy entertaining. Luxury bathrooms feature walk-in shower and floor-to-ceiling tiles; main with deep soak bath. Plus: LED downlights and laundry with storage. Unit 3: 3 bedrooms plus study and 2 bathrooms; master WIR and ensuite; double garage.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Space to live, work and play
PRIOR OFFERS INVITED.
SPACE TO LIVE, WORK AND PLAY!
On a deep, leafy block bordering the Tintern precinct, this 4 bedroom brick veneer house will appeal to families for its backyard bungalow and proximity to schools, reserves and transport. The single-storey floorplan comprises 3 robed bedrooms, a study/4th bedroom and 2 bathrooms. The lounge room has timber floors, a fireplace and sliding-door access to a deck, adjoining a generous meals area and the sun-drenched kitchen featuring backyard views, a dishwasher and updated stainless steel cooking appliances (gas cooktop & oven). The main bathroom has been renovated to a luxury standard and features a combined shower/ spa bath, complementing an ensuite off the master bedroom. The north-oriented backyard houses a 2-room bungalow boasting a bathroom, kitchenette and separate HWS, which may suit a home office or accommodation for relatives/teenagers. Owner-occupied for over 20 years, upgrades include the ducted heating system, water pipes and electrics, complementing timber floors, ceiling fans, sheds and a double carport. The property has potential for extension, landscaping or shedding (STCA) and lies within the Ringwood Secondary College Zone, close to Tintern schools, Cheong Park and Wildflower Sanctuary, Eastfield Mall and Maroondah Hospital. Train stations, Eastland and EastLink access further enhance this convenient yet peaceful position.
HIGHLIGHTS
Modern spa bathroom
North-oriented backyard
Self-contained bungalow
1135 sq m approx.
Near Ringwood & Tintern Schools

Description:
Family Favourite with Dual Accommodation
Are you looking for dual accommodation and a big backyard for the kids? Want a comfortable home that you can modernise and add value to? This spotless 4 bedroom 3 bathroom home is set on 956 m2 (approx.), in a premier address, close to Tinternvale Primary, Tintern Grammar, transport, Tarralla Creek trail and Eastfield Mall. A double carport with workshop, storage and backyard access will look after your cars, caravan and boat. Walk through the entry hallway and discover a neat, light-filled interior warmed by a gas wall furnace. You'll enjoy lovely garden views in the large formal lounge/dining room. The well-equipped kitchen has a servery window into the bright family/meals area (ceiling fan). At the front is a private master with WIR and 2-way ensuite, while bedrooms 2 (BIRs) and 3 (storage) are serviced by a family bathroom. The rear wing has own entry, bedroom 4 (BIRs), the third bathroom and a kitchenette. It's ideal for your guests, relatives, boarder or home office. As you admire the majestic views of the Dandenongs on the covered deck, the kids and pets can play safely in the huge serene garden. Near Eastland and EastLink. Enquire now!
Lee Fenech : 0410 426 400

Description:
QUALITY PROPERTY WITH GREAT OUTDOOR LIVING!
This quality weatherboard home is an absolute winner and perfect for those buyers looking for a low maintenance property with all the comforts of modern living. Situated in a magnificent pocket of Croydon South close to all facilities and surrounded by quality homes, the extensive list of features that this property includes is:
-3 good sized bedrooms (2 with BIRs)
-Large family bathroom with a separate bath
-Open plan living zones with stunning polished floorboards
-Very functional kitchen including D/W, gas cooking & plenty of bench space
-Ducted heating, air conditioner & ceiling fans
-Sensational outdoor living zone with the rear covered deck & play area
-Large carport with plenty of off street parking available
-Low maintenance gardens, lawn areas and sitting on 476m2 (approx.)
If contemporary living is what youre looking for or even a hassle free new investment property to add to the portfolio then dont delay your inspection.
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.

Description:
Endless Opportunities
Set on 871sqm (approx.) in a fantastic location, this home offers incredible opportunity. The dwelling is ideal for first-home buyers, while the land offers immeasurable potential for extension, development and/or subdivision (subject to council approval). Currently tenanted, it also presents an array of benefits for investors.
Comprised of a large living area, 3 bedrooms, and a spacious kitchen and meals area, the home is perfectly proportioned for family life. Also providing a covered deck and an expansive backyard, it is well laid out for entertaining.
Backing onto a beautiful reserve, with a bus stop directly out front, and within easy reach of Eastland, Croydon Station, Eastlink and prestigious schools, the location of this property is unbeatable.
Additional Features:
*Ducted heating, 2x BIRs, neat central bathroom
*Carport plus off-street parking for several cars
*Close to Tintern Grammar & Eastwood Primary
*Easy access to Taralla Creek Trail & Cheong Park
*Walk to Eastfield Shops, near Maroondah Hospital

Set on a generous 860sqm approx block with dual occupancy potential STCA, this 4 bedroom home is perfectly located in a quiet tree lined street only minutes’ from public transport, local parks and medical clinics, schools, Merrindale and Eastfield shopping villages, making it a fantastic home or investment!

Other features include; timber floorboards, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, single lock up garage with workshop area, garden shed, under house storage, ample off street parking and so much more. An inspection will delight!

Description:
Beautiful Beginnings on a Big Block
SOLD BY DENNIS LIM 0488 488 360 - With its beautifully updated interior, big backyard and family-friendly location, this fabulous brick veneer family home offers you the perfect place to begin, invest, subdivide (STCA) or settle.
It's privately set on 892 m (approx.) and is walking distance to transport, shops, Tinternvale Primary School, Childcare, Tintern Grammar, parks and kinder. The large landscaped front garden provides instant curbside appeal and off street parking for your caravan or boat. A double garage with a workshop will also make parking easy. The light-filled interior presents you with comfort and style, from the high ceilings and garden views, to the modern hues and contemporary decor.
Three double bedrooms (double fitted BIRs), a separate toilet and a deluxe bathroom, boasting twin vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles, are privately zoned off the hallway. Cook up a storm in the gourmet kitchen equipped with s/s appliances, Electrolux dishwasher, backyard views and ample storage. Relax in the large lounge/dining room, or step out to the huge elevated deck (roofed), where you can unwind, soak up the treed outlooks or entertain all year round. Children will enjoy the delightful fenced landscaped garden, which has space for an extension (STCA), or you could get creative and explore subdivision (STCA).
Appointments: split system and garden shed. Close to EastLink, Eastland and Knox Westfield.
Be quick!

Description:
Taking It Easy
Taking it easy is what you can do in this magnificent single level townhouse that offers a relaxed, comfortable and low maintenance lifestyle ideal for 1st home buyers, young families, couples, those choosing to downsize or as a solid investment.
Perfectly positioned within walking distance to Eastfield Road shops and Main Street Croydon, the home features 3 good sized robed bedrooms, the main has triple built in robes and a roomy full ensuite.
The 2 living areas provide plenty of space for the family to spread out, starting with the large lounge room that takes in views to the front whilst the family meals area adjacent to the kitchen provides a real hub for everyday living and dining.
The spacious kitchen is well equipped with quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher plus loads of cupboard and bench space to ensure the chef of the family makes their kitchen rule for any meal occasion.
Before we take in the outdoors we mustn't forget other internal features which include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, main bathroom with separate toilet, floating floors through all walk areas, carpeted bedrooms for comfort, separate laundry room, toilets connected to outside water tank plus light filled interiors with soft modern colours and tones.
Stepping out from the family room the outdoor entertaining area is the ideal spot for family gatherings, casual BBQ's, a cool afternoon drink or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in large double garage that has remote controlled roller door at the front and through access to the backyard. There is space at the front of the home for another vehicle or off road storage for a caravan, boat or trailer.
All this is within walking distance to local shops, restaurants, cafes, schools, parks, walking tracks, Croydon Central and all other amenities you might need.
Taking it easy can start today with your viewing.

Description:
SPACE, STYLE & A LOCATION TO ENVY!
With a location second to none, space and light combine for unsurpassed low-maintenance living. This captivating residence balances natural elements throughout, providing a compelling option for young professionals, investors and empty nesters looking to downsize, yet maintaining a homely sense of space!
The entertainer in you is sure to be impressed with the open plan design, incorporating a servery style kitchen meals area, great size lounge lined with polished timber floors and an additional elevated deck of grand proportions providing a perfect space to be enjoyed while entertaining guests!
With 3 double bedrooms providing fitted robe space, family bathroom, separate second toilet and huge laundry this home is sure to exceed the expectations of even the most discerning buyer.
Further features include; fully landscaped front and rear yard, Coonara style fire place, quality window furnishings, great size remote lock up garage, plus second car space on title. All this located within meters to parks, shops, schools and great public transport access just around the corner. This residence provides the independent space of a family home yet remains an ideal example of low maintenance living!
Due diligence checklist for residential property buyer- http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Expressions of Interest by Thursday 16 July at 5.30pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Often sought, seldom found (1,472 sq m approximately)
You have invested time and research finding your perfect new home, now you need the ideal land parcel to realize that dream. It can't be just any old block: you want exclusivity, plenty of open space with stunning native surrounds, but not too far from convenience.
This 1,472 sq m approx. lies in a coveted enclave of no-through streets bordering Ringwood East and Tintern schools. Slightly elevated, this pristine land has never been developed, creating an exceptional blank canvas with the freedom to build the new house you want (STCA).
Downsizers struggling to find a suitable unit may design and build the home they need, while family buyers and young professionals will appreciate the quiet surrounds and proximity to Tintern Schools, Cheong Park, Eastfield Mall, Maroondah Hospital and a short commute to stations, Eastland and EastLink access.
Quality vacant land is at a premium and therefore highly sought-after, so this big block could be your last chance for a tree-change in a boutique location.
- 1472 sq m approx.
- Ready to build (STCA)
- Walk to Tintern schools
- Nearby shops and stations
- Short commute to Eastland and EastLink
Agent on site at the following date and times:
OFI Sat 27/06/2015 10:00AM 10:30AM

Description:
Neat & Sweet
Landscaped gardens and a comfortable, modern interior, make this beautifully presented 3 bedroom 1 bathroom family retreat a must-see. This private, single level home is set in a picturesque no-through road and is perfect for first homebuyers, young families, investors or downsizers. A front verandah and pretty landscaped garden will capture your heart. Indoors, streams of natural light, garden views and contemporary dcor create a welcoming, easy vibe. Discover a private master with 2 double BIRs. Two double bedrooms (BIRs) and bathroom are in a separate wing. A large living zone and an open plan kitchen and meals area ensure effortless living and entertaining with direct access to the patio. Outdoors you will find a great sized backyard with an extended covered patio right around the side of the home and leads you to the 3 garden sheds all of which differ in size and storage capabilities. You'll love to relax in the paved entertaining area and exquisite landscaped garden where colour is all around you. Appointments: Double carport with access to the patio, heating, air conditioner, ceiling fans, near new carpets and freshly painted throughout with excellent built-in storage and garden sheds. A premier neighbourhood, close to Eastfield Mall, Tinternvale Primary, bus, shops, Eastfield Park and EastLink as well as being central to Eastland, Knox and the Dandenongs. Act now.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
Under Offer/Under Contract. This home creates a wonderful first impression thanks to the happy sound of birds in the trees, a leafy cul de sac location, and a warm inviting front veranda to greet you. Set on a 417m2 allotment, this well presented residence comprises a spacious lounge/dining with bay window that catches the morning sun, adjoining kitchen/meals/family room with gas cooking, wall oven, and garden access, 3 robed bedrooms (master with walk-thru robe to ensuite), central family bathroom with separate WC, and practical laundry. Outside, a paved and covered alfresco area is just the place to relax and unwind during your downtime. The pretty rear garden is an ideal outdoor space for busy people - easy to manage yet enjoying plenty of pretty winter blooms. Finishing touches include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote double garage with rear roller door, and an easy access single level design. A short walk to local schools and parklands, with good access to train, bus, a choice of shopping precincts, Eastlink and more. Book your inspection today!

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
UNDER OFFER/UNDER CONTRACT - With magical views of Mt Dandenong, this spacious family home enjoys a large corner allotment with manicured gardens all around. Featuring polished hardwood floors and a vibrant décor, accommodation comprises lounge/dining with Victorian fireplace, picture rails, and ornate cornice/ceiling roses; solid timber kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances and adjoining meals area, 4 good-sized bedrooms all with built-in robes, family bathroom with separate WC, powder room, and a spacious upstairs living zone. The private leafy garden provides an irresistible outdoor space, featuring covered alfresco zone with Ziptrack blinds, lush green lawn, fernery, and several shady nooks for quiet relaxation. Additional features include ducted heating, split system air conditioning, 2 water tanks, garden shed, instant hot water, and remote double garage. An easy walk to Merrindale Shopping Centre, Dorset Primary, bus, and parklands - now is the time to inspect!
